skills.skill: Strong understanding of outerwear construction and fit

duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop, execute, and manage global outerwear design creation, focusing on women's outerwear experience and performance.
Participate in category direction, vision, and execution, considering market trends and fashion elements.
Manage and direct the apparel design team, overseeing daily tasks, performance, and future development.
Accountable for the apparel design team's quality, accuracy of work, and deadlines, managing workload and deliverables across multiple projects and seasons.

Work cross-functionally with other apparel design partners, product, merchandising, materials, trims, tech design, and innovation to ensure business and design vision needs are considered and executed through the supply chain.
Partner on process improvement ideas within apparel design, proactively addressing challenges and providing solution-oriented approaches.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in apparel design or relevant field (Master's preferred)
